name: Freelance Janky Alpha
description:
FREELANCE is a game I made in 5 days. This wasn't even supposed to be a full game, but it sorta took on a life of it's own. This was originally a debug room for another game I'm currently making.

Please enjoy and share with your friends.

STORY: You need money. You must get it and that's all there is too it. After becoming down and out and in need of cash, you (the player) meet a shady politician named Dick Diamond who you will carry out various tasks for from assassinations to grand theft auto. All in the name of cash.

UPDATE PLANS: This is a janky alpha, but it does run fairly well (if there are any bugs please contact me) and there are 2 updates\expansion packs planned for next year which will had 7 new missions and also some mini games, so there's that.

Please Enjoy and here's a look at the trailer 

Please like and share with your friends
